newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Bioscience hires an operating chief.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Bioscience hires an operating chief.

text.p: U.S. Bioscience Inc said Wednesday C. Boyd Clarke has been appointed president and chief operating officer of the company.
A 19-year veteran of Merck & Co, Clarke was vice president, strategy, alliance management and development at Merck Vaccines prior to joining U.S. Bioscience, it said.

The company said Clarke succeeds Philip Schein who continues as chairman and chief executive and will assume day-to-day responsibility for the company's commercial and scientific operations. Clarke has also been elected to the company's board of directors.
